sourcesContent: Магазин import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserAuthService } from '../_services/user-auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from '../_services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor( private userAuthService: UserAuthService, private router: Router, protected userService: UserService ) {} public isLoggedIn() { return this.userAuthService.isLoggedIn(); } public logout() { this.userAuthService.clear(); this.router.navigate(['/']); } public isAdmin() { return this.userAuthService.isAdmin(); } public isUser() { return this.userAuthService.isUser(); } }
